DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate abuse potential ALKS 5461 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Abuse Liability Potential ALKS 5461 Healthy , Non-Dependent , Recreational Opioid Users
DOC.criteria: Have body mass index ( BMI ) within range 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 , inclusive , minimum weight least 50.0 kg Be current recreational opioid user use opioids nontherapeutic purpose ( ie psychoactive effect ) least 10 time lifetime Agree use approve method contraception duration study unless surgically sterile postmenopausal Be willing able abide study requirement restriction Additional criterion may apply Have evidence drug alcohol dependence within past 2 year Have positive drug screen opioids , amphetamine , cocaine , benzodiazepine upon admission clinic Have history severe allergic reaction ( include anaphylaxis ) food , medication , bee sting Be currently pregnant , breastfeed , plan become pregnant study Currently history allergy hypersensitivity opioid agonist , opioid antagonist relate drug ( eg , oxycodone , morphine , naltrexone , naloxone ) Have positive test result hepatitis B , hepatitis C , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Have donate lose 500 mL whole blood Additional criterion may apply .
